transArray.content: Breakfast, to be honest, is not as delicious as the reviews say. Maybe everyone's taste is very different. However, the service attitude of the staff is really good, especially the robot in the lobby. The children like it very much. Even though they have had dinner, they are clamoring for takeaway just to watch the robot go upstairsðŸ˜…

Hello dear guest! Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and for commenting and approving the service attitude of our staff. Your support is the greatest encouragement to our work. The hotel robot waiter will provide you with full contactless service at all times to allow you to check in. You can feel more at ease and rest assured. The long buffet breakfast from 7 am to 11 am will bring you full positive energy for the day. All the hotel staff look forward to your every visit and wish you all the best! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
